[[File:Bag_Fighting_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Fighting Egg]] A '''Fighting Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Fighting-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | Hitmonchan || | Tyrogue || Makuhita || Riolu || Throh || |- | Hitmonlee || | || Meditite || || Sawk|| |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || | || | || || || |- | [[File:Mankey.png|40px]] Mankey || | || | || || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Saffron City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Cianwood City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Mahogany Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Dewford Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Canalave City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Lacunosa City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Shalour City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
